flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=18>>18 times a year
That means he gets 18*2=<<18*2=63>>63 deers per year
So he catches 63*600=<<63*600=37800>>37800 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 37800/2=<<37800/2=18900>>18900 pounds of deer a year
#### 18900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
